Text: Ms Shackleton I refer to your fax dated th March The seller whether it is an Indian company or a foreign company is not required to be registered with the BSE for the purpose of selling publicly traded shares held by it of an Indian Company Only brokers and other intermediaries such as merchant bankers etc are required to be registered with SEBI or BSE Please note that Vinay Dwarkadas is no longer working with us Regards S N Talwar Get Your Private Free Email from MSN Hotmail at
